title.narrative: OP4: PROGRAMME SUPPORT

description.narrative: Effective and efficient management of the Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) Programme, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the most disadvantaged children and their families have equitable access to and use of sustainable improved water sources, sanitation facilities, and adopt hygiene practices

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective and efficient management of the WASH Programme

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF provided technical and financial support to Government Partners, to strengthen WASH systems and programmes consistent with the Country Programme of Cooperation. This support included technical support for critical hygiene messaging during the COVID-19 response, strengthening WASH technical and financial management systems and approaches and collaborative development of the 2022-2026 WASH CPD components. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:01/02/2022
